original_text: And Jeremiah said unto the house of the Rechabites, Thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel; Because ye have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father, and kept all his precepts, and done according unto all that he hath commanded you:
korean_text: 예레미야가 레갑 사람의 가문에게 이르되 만군의 여호와 이스라엘의 하나님께서 이와 같이 말씀하시기를 너희가 너희 선조 요나답의 명령을 순종하여 그의 모든 규율을 지키며 그가 너희에게 명령한 것을 행하였도다

sentences.original_text: And Jeremiah said unto the house of Rechabites
Thus saith the Lord of hosts
Because ye have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너희 아비 요나답의 명령을 순종하였고

sentences.original_text: and done according unto all that he hath commanded you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희에게 명령한 모든 것대로 행하였느니라
